Text:
Mask mandates discourage family travel & force Americans with children—especially those with disabilities—to cancel travel or else live in fear that an untimely tantrum could cost over a thousand dollars in fines. Our bill will end this punitive practice.
https://t.co/aVNQIsT698

US tax payers shouldn’t have to pay for a liberal UN bureaucrat to malign our country. The Congress should deduct the cost of this investigation and any future investigations from the next UN funding bill.

The report accuses Americans of demonizing the poor and asserts that “racism is a constant dimension” of American life. It attacks states’ rights and tax cuts, condemns voter ID, and calls for an end to cash bail.
https://t.co/C8TRD42XSp

The last time that the United States invited a UN Special Rapporteur into our country they produced a left wing screed of Democrat talking points attacking our nation.
https://t.co/qo4xWjcngt

Federal judges, particularly Circuit Court judges, don’t get to pick and choose which cases are precedent based on their opinion of the court’s decision. 

Yet Myrna Perez has a history of doing just that. https://t.co/Wja2Cd8zIF

Critical Race Theory teaches people to obsess over race and to believe that America is an evil, oppressive place. Federal funds should not be used to support activists in schools who want to teach our kids to hate each other and their country.
https://t.co/m4vbyxhv4E

As protestors in Cuba, Hong Kong, and other dictatorships wave American flags while they fight for freedom, Democrats in the White House ask those same tyrannical dictatorships to label the United States a “human rights abuser.” https://t.co/15ubwxc32i

The Iranians won’t accept the administration’s surrender in Vienna, so what does the White House do? Up front sanctions relief. This is paying ransom to nuclear terrorists.

https://t.co/VcA6fJBhK6

Naval officers are losing confidence in our Navy’s surface warfare component, which has suffered a string of mistakes, including several incidents involving warships like the McCain. 

The Navy must make internal changes to ensure our sailors are ready to fight and win tonight. https://t.co/RTqjFEIC5k

You can either fund the police or empower the gangs—this shouldn’t be a difficult decision.
https://t.co/Q6eQFmmN3D

One of the nation’s largest defense contractors, @RaytheonTech, is indoctrinating employees with Critical Race Theory-inspired trainings.

This is unacceptable. American companies have a responsibility to treat everyone equally, without regard to race.
https://t.co/DRPkGnTz1U

The Biden administration shouldn’t sacrifice the health of U.S. citizens to shield illegal immigrants. Our bill simply upholds successful immigration policies that protect Americans from the coronavirus and its variants.
https://t.co/3yX70ok4c3

The findings of this investigation into the Navy’s culture are concerning. I intend to work with veterans, Navy leaders, and my colleagues to implement the report’s recommendations.
https://t.co/9U0pVSZd6z

The current situation in Cuba is a reminder why Captive Nations Week is as important as ever. We must never forget those held by the shackles of communism.
https://t.co/arUwDTZWiT
For decades, the Castro regime has terrorized the Cuban people. Today, Americans stand with the Cuban people as they bravely take to the streets and demand freedom.

Stop funding Chinese tech companies. We are financing a genocidal regime that poses an active risk to US investors. 

https://t.co/vWBbybPhR1

In addition to defunding the police, Rashida Tlaib now wants to defund our immigration enforcement. 

Sanctuary cities aren't enough--Democrats want the United States to be a sanctuary country for all illegal aliens. https://t.co/5Q9jWBtPiB

Professor García has no business teaching the Constitution or political science at the Air Force Academy.

We should not be teaching cadets that our military is a fundamentally racist institution. https://t.co/UPgm3KS1p8

Good to see so many friendly faces down at the Pickens Store—a Desha County classic. 

Thanks Fred for having us down! https://t.co/JvMccllUoh
In Pickens today, I spoke with producers about recent flooding in Southeast Arkansas and how the Biden administration’s tax plan is threatening family farms. https://t.co/x7OpYdMJDw

Happy Independence Day! Today we celebrate the founding of this great nation.

May god bless the United States of America and those who fight to protect our freedoms.

Ballot harvesting—particularly when practiced by political activists—should be illegal. I was proud to join my colleagues in an amicus brief in support of Arizona’s election integrity measures, and I’m glad the Supreme Court has ruled in favor.
https://t.co/l1NYB8oeWw

Today, Beijing celebrates 100 years of the Chinese Communist Party while the Chinese people and the rest of the world mourn its contributions to society—millions killed by its atrocities, slave labor, genocide, religious persecution, organ harvesting, and a global pandemic.

America has lost a gentleman and a true patriot.

My thoughts and prayers are with Donald Rumsfeld's friends and family. https://t.co/vTyMHuSPGm

Young Americans are in desperate need of history and civic education—not Critical Race Theory and the 1619 Project.
https://t.co/BVGcKEi5kD
If Gwen Berry is so embarrassed by America, then there’s no reason she needs to compete for our country at the Olympics. https://t.co/8OeXVOPqVd
.@Nike's attitude toward genocide in China is "Just Do It."
The Democrats' "infrastructure" bill is an effort to pass a multi-trillion dollar spending bill to support the Green New Deal and old style welfare. https://t.co/v9gLb0ZdcS

I’m praying for Officer Kevin Apple’s family and friends during this terrible tragedy. Our police officers risk their lives each day to protect us from violent crimes, and we must continue to support their efforts.
https://t.co/mDlVPLH8yY

If we did not have a border crisis we would not have a drug crisis. 

The majority of meth, cocaine, heroin, and fentanyl is smuggled across the Mexican border.
The only good Soros prosecutor is a defeated Soros prosecutor. Every single one of them should be recalled, removed, and replaced.
The consequences of the Ferguson Effect paled in comparison to the devastation wreaked by the BLM Effect.
We must invest in our nation’s prison system to ensure jails and prisons can safely hold inmates and provide them with an opportunity to become productive members of society.

President Biden’s only “solution” to violent crime is a Second Amendment crackdown. 

A gun-grabber’s wish list is not an anti-crime agenda.

The Democratic Party is pro-riot, anti-cop, and anti-prosecutor. 

Democrats today have more sympathy for violent criminals than for innocent victims.
After President Biden's speech yesterday, it's no surprise gun grabber David Chipman is his nominee to lead the ATF. https://t.co/D8lXafZpf4

The Golan Heights is sovereign Israeli territory. Reversing this U.S. policy would betray our Israeli allies and give a gift to mass murderer Bashar al-Assad.
https://t.co/BofuhXnpyd

Instead of repealing popular policies and repeating the mistakes of the Obama administration, the EPA should allow states to regulate waters within their borders.
https://t.co/ecWIhLbRp0

Corporate America—source your products from somewhere without slave labor.

Get out of China.
https://t.co/cfFG8eiXjQ
The President didn’t announce a violent crime plan. He read a gun grabber’s wish list.
Enforcing more burdensome inspections of legal gun stores will not reduce violent crime—prosecuting criminals who use guns illegally will.
The Navy should focus on fighting real wars instead of culture wars. https://t.co/qg1Uf8Dxr4

Amazon could have donated any sort of helpful education materials.

Instead, they’re promoting racial discrimination—to children.
https://t.co/CqEMGFqgre

Nearly 800,000 Arkansans have prediabetes, and data shows prevention programs can drastically reduce type 2 diabetes prevalence. Our bill would provide greater virtual access to the Medicare Diabetes Prevention Program.
https://t.co/elXBTXlpDX

The Navy has had genuine cultural problems and a lack of focus for years.

Teaching Critical Race Theory will promote hatred of our country and divide the Navy even further. https://t.co/7NZfsfHGFs

Democrats could call for ceding D.C. back to Maryland, if representation were their true goal.

But it isn’t—they want two more Democratic senators.

The ayatollahs have chosen a mass murderer as president in their latest “election.” Instead of lifting sanctions on these murderous terrorists, President Biden should support the Iranian people’s demands for accountability from this regime.
President Biden should stop denying the science: unborn babies are human beings. https://t.co/FZNTXfiIrV

Crack & powder cocaine both kill thousands every year, but penalties for selling each aren’t the same. My bill increases penalties for criminals trafficking powder cocaine to ensure fairness in sentencing without granting early release to drug traffickers. https://t.co/jTX5wK5QwD
Republicans don’t have a plan to nationalize elections because we trust our states, counties, and cities to run our elections the way they have for over 200 years. https://t.co/rGVsxN7ld9

The Chinese Communist Party isn’t going to open its labs to allow an investigation into the origin of this virus.

It’s well past time the Biden administration begin imposing consequences on the CCP. https://t.co/E39RIkLMbq

On this first national holiday of Juneteenth, let us all take pride in our great nation and the strides it has made to realize fully the promise of America.
https://t.co/6a2dHisHtB
S.1 is the Democrats' attempt to permanently rig our elections. https://t.co/fxzRgMTnef

The CCP has made consistent attempts to infiltrate American colleges and universities. Our bill will close donation loopholes, barring the CCP and other foreign agents from donating millions to levy influence and steal American intellectual property.
https://t.co/Wz2cbKKr6y

Huge win for religious liberty!

I was proud to file a legal brief in favor of religious charities along with my colleagues earlier this year. https://t.co/6LXOFg2eQt

Allowing the PLA unfettered access to research visas is an open invitation to steal American research & intellectual property. The US shouldn’t be arming our greatest adversary—our bill will block Chinese military affiliates from receiving research visas.
https://t.co/3VGJe8N6Yq
The government persecution of Jack Phillips must end. I trust the Supreme Court will uphold his constitutional rights once again. https://t.co/YJjmJWRtzj
President Biden is more concerned about being “a part of the club” with foreign leaders and international bureaucrats than he is about standing up for America. https://t.co/cR42VVKboo
The so-called For the People Act is a partisan takeover of our elections that seeks a government of the Democrats, by the Democrats, and for the Democrats. https://t.co/PP6lef5XKx
If the safety, security, and privacy of our athletes cannot be guaranteed, the United States must adopt a total and complete boycott of the Beijing Winter Olympics. https://t.co/G6mmTLutmQ

Americans traveling to the Beijing Olympics will likely have their rooms bugged and electronics hacked, their DNA collected, and potentially face arbitrary detention.

President Biden must be prepared to confront these threats.
https://t.co/3hRzbfDofY
Until President Biden confronts Russia with strength and vigor, Vladimir Putin will know he has the upper hand. https://t.co/3T4BOucebX
Passing a massive amnesty bill will make the border crisis much, much worse. https://t.co/0sl0EyKdNf

Unlike olympics held in friendly, free nations, the 2022 Beijing Games will pose unique challenges for the safety, security and privacy of Americans who attend.

If the U.S. chooses to participate, President Biden must be prepared to  protect our athletes.
https://t.co/2i2TdRiRIW
Happy 185th Birthday to the Natural State! On this day in 1836, Arkansas became the 25th state.
Before rubber-stamping military promotions, perhaps the Senate should take a closer look at which officers are indoctrinating our troops with Critical Race Theory. https://t.co/LjoogjlNaP
On Flag Day we pause to honor our national symbol of freedom and those who have served to protect it.

Activists in schools want to teach our kids to hate America and hate each other using discredited, Critical Race Theory curricula like the 1619 Project. Federal funds should not pay for activists to masquerade as teachers and indoctrinate our youth.
https://t.co/ytnLjAHjd5

Every minute wasted teaching Critical Race Theory in the military is time that could have been dedicated to military history or field training.

If we continue down this road, our troops will bear the cost. https://t.co/9NroWwLYbf

Here were my questions to Sec. Austin—these are not trick questions.
- Is our military a fundamentally racist organization?
- Should servicemembers should be treated differently based on race or sex?
- Should race and sex should be the key factor when selecting combat leaders?
We cannot continue teaching our children and our troops to believe America is an inherently evil and racist place. https://t.co/e2zRZc7E0R
I’m glad Secretary Austin agrees—Critical Race Theory has no place in our military. https://t.co/Xk1ELnHBPF

Dr. Fauci has lost the confidence of the American people with his repeated evasions, misdirection, and politicized statements. If he won’t resign, Joe Biden should fire him.

https://t.co/FnUlfNmBuk

180,000 illegal immigrants crossed our borders in May alone—the most in 21 years. The root cause of the border crisis is the Biden White House. 

https://t.co/YGCqpNVsYA
My office is monitoring the flooding across Southeast Arkansas and will be ready to assist if necessary. Please follow local advisories and safety information. https://t.co/OKm7SQAOti

The Biden EPA’s decision to abandon the Navigable Water Protection rule is a political move to pacify radical environmentalists and to expand federal control, at the expense of Arkansans. 

We’ve fought this battle before and won—we can do it again.

 https://t.co/Yheq6SQ5Zi

President Biden killed the Keystone XL pipeline in the name of ‘clean energy,’ but waived sanctions in order to allow the construction of Russia’s Nord Stream 2 pipeline.

Our bill will hold President Biden accountable for his blatant disregard for hard-working Americans. https://t.co/984xk87R6i

Congratulations to Secretary @Wesley__Ward for hosting an outstanding SASDA Conference! 

I’m proud that leaders from across the Southeast were able to see Arkansas’ flourishing agriculture industry firsthand.
VP Harris didn't need to travel to Guatemala to find the "root causes" of the border crisis—the "root causes" are in the White House. https://t.co/988LbmLUEA
Either President Biden wasn’t negotiating in good faith, or he’s not in charge of his administration. https://t.co/Jy5ot2j26N
I was proud to join @SenatorCollins to help American officials suffering from brain injuries linked to energy attacks during their service. https://t.co/qJSFyypJES

The Wuhan labs are the prime suspects, as they have been from the very beginning.
https://t.co/n5sVYDNsjy

VP Harris says there’s “no quick fix” to the border crisis. 

But it was fixed. President Biden broke it deliberately his first day in office. 
https://t.co/PGkhhbHP2j

There’s no end to the things the United States can do to make China pay for unleashing this virus.

We should start with revoking its permanent most favored nation status and reevaluating who from China is qualified for an American visa. https://t.co/LqWFIPKQCg
.@Ilhan was a refugee from Somalia and America welcomed her. If she really believes America is a hateful country on par with the Taliban and Hamas, she's welcome to leave. https://t.co/Hji2eEy5zt

Democrats know their policies are responsible for higher crime, higher prices, and the border crisis.

The American people know it too. https://t.co/BtlGy56MWG

The Biden administration just released a new rule to redefine millions of pistols as “short barreled rifles,” forcing law-abiding gun owners to pay a $200 tax per pistol or become federal criminals.
https://t.co/bx8ZiFHtcY

The Chinese Communist Party deceived the world.

It should be held accountable. https://t.co/U3upNHbfuk
Today marks 77 years since the Allied forces stormed the beaches of Normandy. D-Day reminds us of the courage and heroic sacrifices our troops have made for freedom.

Democrats aren’t just waging a war on police. This is a war to protect criminals at the expense of their victims.
https://t.co/LKkuBqc4Bh
I’m proud to join this bipartisan effort to ensure our poultry farmers receive the help they need to recover from covid-19. https://t.co/J4Y2i7czKk

32 years ago today, the world saw the true face of the Chinese Communist Party. But through the darkness of repression and smoke of gunfire, there was also the courage and nobility of a people that dream of freedom. We remember those brave souls today and honor their sacrifice.

Fighter jets will return to the Arkansas River Valley, thanks to years of hard work by Fort Smith, our federal delegation and the governor. I'm grateful the Air Force and our friends from Singapore have chosen Fort Smith for this national security mission.
https://t.co/rrg5jMKsQd

Without a safe & secure agriculture supply chain, the US can’t reliably feed its people. The JBS attack proves our enemies will target that supply chain given the chance. We should pass my AIM Act to help protect American food & technology from sabotage.
https://t.co/vYQ4ENt7JB

The CCP can modify the One-Child Policy all it wants. The reality is that it still controls how many children its subjects may welcome into the world. We cannot forget the Chinese government’s violent campaign to control its population using abortion, sterilization & infanticide.

Republicans are ready to invest in our physical infrastructure—like the Port of Little Rock.

I enjoyed meeting with @LittleRockPort officials yesterday to talk about how we can improve our roads, bridges, waterways, and railroads. https://t.co/0aFERSSLhA

Law requires the Department of Defense to name all the Chinese military companies operating in the U.S. 

That list is a month overdue. 

The DOD should publish this report immediately to block American technology and funding from flowing to the PLA.
https://t.co/p3kCMc67ZI

Abilities Unlimited in Hot Springs is inspiring. It provides a community and work for those who may not be able to find employment elsewhere. 

I will continue to fight for the 14(c) exception in Congress so places like this can keep serving their communities. https://t.co/IvA8UbFfOo

On this sacred day of remembrance, we pay tribute to the fallen warriors who gave their dying breath in service to this exceptional nation. Today, more than any other day, our country gives them the recognition that they deserve.
https://t.co/biowKoOMgc

Omaha—here we come!

Congrats, Coach Van Horn on first SEC tournament championship for the @RazorbackBSB!

Woo Pig Sooie! https://t.co/uglNLj7yRA
